nodes.text: The Gallery of Ancestors was a sacred site on the planet Sullust that contained the vaults of deceased Sullustans. Inside was the Catacomb of Eminents where the vaults of eminent Sullustans were located, including that of Galactic Alliance Supreme Commander Sien Sovv. After Sovv's funeral in 36 ABY, SoroSuub Corporation sponsored a funerary feast here which was unrivaled in the history of the planet.
